answers.answer: I don't think 4 pints is a lot at all really. Excessive thirst can be a sign of gestational diabetes though along with frequent uration particularly at night. If 4 pints of water is all ur drinking a day though I suggest increasing ur fluid intake cus I'm not sure thats enough

4 pints is sufficient. Its the recommended 8, 8 ounce glasses per day but since your pregnant now, try drinking a little bit more. Its pretty normal to be really thirsty though this early in pregnancy. I was also with every pregnancy. My throat always seemed super dry. It stopped around 2nd trimester though. If ur concerned talk to ur OB.
